v.v: Yahweh, do not rebuke me in your anger;
For your arrows pierce me,
My whole body is sick because of your anger;
For my iniquities overwhelm me;
My wounds are infected and smell
I am stooped over and humiliated every day;
For within me, I am filled with burning;
I am numb and utterly crushed;
Lord, you understand my heartâ€™s deepest yearnings,
My heart pounds, my strength fades,
My friends and companions shun me because of my condition;
Those who seek my life lay snares for me.
But I, I am like a deaf man and hear nothing;
I am like a man who does not hear
Surely I wait for you, Yahweh;
I say this so that my enemies will not gloat over me.
For I am about to stumble,
I confess my guilt;
But my enemies are numerous;
They repay me evil for good;
Do not abandon me, Yahweh;
Come quickly to help me,

v: do not punish me in your wrath.
and your hand presses me down.
there is no health in my bones because of my sin.
they are a burden too heavy for me.
because of my foolish sins.
I go about mourning all day long.
there is no health in my flesh.
I groan because of the anguish of my heart.
and my groanings are not hidden from you.
and my eyesight dims.
my neighbors stand far off.
They who seek my harm speak destructive words
and say deceitful words all day long.
I am like a mute man who says nothing.
and who has no reply.
you will answer, Lord my God.
If my foot slips, they will do terrible things to me.
and I am in constant pain.
I am concerned about my sin.
those who hate me wrongfully are many.
they hurl accusations at me although I have pursued what is good.
my God, do not stay far away from me.
Lord, my salvation.
